statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, carbon_credits, offset_date FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT project_name, offset_date, carbon_credits, project_id FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT carbon_credits, project_id, project_name, offset_date FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT offset_date, project_name, carbon_credits, project_id FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, carbon_credits FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE offset_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, carbon_credits, offset_date FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE project_id = '87654321-1234-5678-9876-543210987654';
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY offset_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, carbon_credits FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE carbon_credits > 500 AND offset_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, SUM(carbon_credits) AS total_credits FROM carbon_offset_credits GROUP BY project_name HAVING total_credits > 1000;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits LIMIT 5
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY credits_generated DESC
SELECT project_name, credits_sold FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_sold > 500
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE project_name LIKE '%green%'
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals
SELECT project_name, credits_generated FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_generated > 1000
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY credits_sold DESC
SELECT project_name, credits_generated FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE project_id = 3
SELECT project_name, credits_sold FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_sold < 500
SELECT goal_name, goal_description FROM sustainability_goals
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT project_name, credits_generated FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_sold > 100;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_type FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT goal_name, achieved_credits FROM sustainability_goals WHERE target_credits >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_generated > 1000;
SELECT project_name, credits_sold FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE credits_sold < 500;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM renewable_energy_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT goal_name, target_credits, achieved_credits FROM sustainability_goals WHERE achieved_credits < target_credits;
SELECT project_name, project_type, start_date, end_date FROM renewable_energy_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits;
SELECT project_name, offset_credits FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY offset_credits DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE offset_credits > 1000;
SELECT * FROM energy_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, capacity FROM energy_projects WHERE capacity >= 500;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset_credits ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, offset_credits, start_date, end_date FROM carbon_offset_credits WHERE offset_credits >= 1000;
SELECT project_name, location, capacity FROM energy_projects WHERE project_type = 'Solar';
SELECT * FROM sustainability_goals WHERE target_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY target_date DESC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM project_investors WHERE investment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project;
SELECT project_name, total_credits FROM project WHERE total_credits > 1000;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM energy_source ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(energy_units) AS total_energy FROM project_energy GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT goal_id, goal_description FROM sustainability_goals;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM carbon_offset WHERE offset_credits > 1000;
SELECT project_name, energy_units, source_name FROM project_energy JOIN energy_source ON project_energy.source_id = energy_source.source_id;
SELECT project_name, total_credits FROM project WHERE total_credits > 5000 AND end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT goal_description FROM sustainability_goals WHERE goal_id IN (1, 2, 3);
